hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Sun's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Zelda's Lullaby#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Din's Fire#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found in #Goron City#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #0# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Din's Fire#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Fire Temple#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #the Lens of Truth#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Hidden Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Why are you asking me? I don't have any answers! I'm just as confused as you are!

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #a Bomb Bag#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Sun's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: Boing-oing!^There are times in life when one should seek the help of others...^Thus, when standing alone fails to help, stand together.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #7# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Oh!^Oh-oh!^C'mon!^Come on! Come on! Come on!^HOT!!^What a hot beat!^WHOOOOAH!^YEEEEAH!^YAHOOO!!
